mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWBOARD(BOARD_NO, COURSENAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, IMGLINK, USER_NO, REGDATE) VALUES((SELECT NULLIF (MAX(A.BOARD_NO),0)+1 FROM REVIEWBOARD A), #{coursename}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{imglink}, #{user_no}, #{regdate})
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.COURSENAME, B.TITLE, U.USER_NAME, B.REGDATE FROM REVIEWBOARD B, USER_INFO U WHERE B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO ORDER BY B.REGDATE DESC
SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.COURSENAME, B.TITLE, U.USER_NAME, B.REGDATE FROM REVIEWBOARD B, USER_INFO U WHERE B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO and B.COURSENAME =#{coursename} ORDER BY B.REGDATE DESC
SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.COURSENAME, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.IMGLINK, U.USER_NAME, B.REGDATE, B.USER_NO FROM REVIEWBOARD B, USER_INFO U WHERE B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND B.BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update REVIEWBOARD set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents}, IMGLINK=#{imglink}, REGDATE=#{regdate} where BOARD_NO=#{board_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from REVIEWBOARD WHERE COURSENAME=#{coursename}

select * from ( select R.BOARD_NO, R.COURSENAME, R.TITLE, R.CONTENTS, R.REGDATE, U.USER_NAME, R.IMGLINK from REVIEWBOARD R, USER_INFO U WHERE U.USER_NO = R.USER_NO order by BOARD_NO desc) as T1 limit #{skip},#{amount}
